description: A cute and well-made match three game.
Gave me many hours of enjoyment!

very creative hand-drawn graphics with a logical pace. easy to start and each board offers added challange

needs a good sound track

works perfectly on the librem5

One of the better designed Linux games, especially for mobile. 

No way to backup/sync progress, missing convergent features like resizable window, landscape mode, keyboard/controller support that would be expected from Purism. Not listed on Flathub.
summary: Decent Game But Not Convergent As Expected
